name: Printer Configuration
description: This Module describes Printer Configuration Information.

name: Storage Commitment
description: This module defines the Attributes for referencing SOP Instances that are contained in a Storage Commitment Request/Response.

name: SR Document Series
description: This module defines the Attributes of the SR Document Series. A Series of SR Documents may contain any number of SR Documents.

name: SR Document General
description: This module defines the general Attributes of an SR Document Instance. These Attributes identify the SR Document and provide context for the entire document.

name: Hierarchical SOP Instance Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that reference a list of SOP Instances.

name: Hierarchical Series Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that reference a list of SOP Instances.

name: Identified Person or Device
description: This macro defines the Attributes that identify a person or a device. This Macro contains content equivalent to TID 1002 (see PS3.16).

name: SR Document Content
description: This section specifies the Attributes contained in the This module . The Attributes in this Module convey the content of an SR Document.

name: Document Content
description: This section specifies the Attributes contained in the This module . The Attributes in this Module convey the content of an SR Document.

name: Document Relationship
description: This section specifies the Attributes contained in the This module . The Attributes in this Module convey the content of an SR Document.

name: Key Object Document Series
description: This module defines the Attributes of the Key Object Document Series.

name: Key Object Document
description: This module defines the general Attributes of a Key Object Selection Document. These Attributes identify and provide context for the Key Object Selection Document.

name: Numeric Measurement
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that convey a NUM (numeric measurement) value.

name: Code
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that convey a CODE value.

name: Composite Object Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that convey a reference to a DICOM Composite Object that is not a DICOM Image or Waveform (such as an SR Document), or to an HL7 Structured Document.

name: Image Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that convey a reference to a DICOM image.

name: Waveform Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that convey a reference to a DICOM waveform.

name: Spatial Coordinates
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that convey Spatial Coordinates in an SCOORD Content Item. An SCOORD Content Item shall always be the Source Content Item of one or more SELECTED FROM Relationships with IMAGE Target Content Items. Each IMAGE Target Content Item shall contain a reference to one single-frame or multi-frame Image.

name: Temporal Coordinates
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that convey TCOORD Content Items. A TCOORD Content Item shall be the Source Content Item of one or more SELECTED FROM relationships with one or more SCOORD Content Items, one or more IMAGE Content Items, or one or more WAVEFORM Content Items.

name: Container
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that convey a CONTAINER Content Item.

name: 3D Spatial Coordinates
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that convey 3D Spatial Coordinates in an SCOORD3D Content Item.

name: Raw Data
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe a raw data stream.

name: Spatial Registration Series
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Spatial Registration Series Module.

name: Spatial Registration
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Spatial Registration Module.

name: Deformable Spatial Registration
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Deformable Spatial Registration Module.

name: Spatial Fiducials Series
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Spatial Fiducials Series Module.

name: Spatial Fiducials
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Registration.

name: Media Creation Management
description: Table C.22.1-1. Media Creation Management Module Attributes

name: Hanging Protocol Definition
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe and identify the high level definition of a Hanging Protocol, including its overall purpose, and the types of image sets to which it applies. See Annex V “Hanging Protocols (Informative)” in PS3.17 for further explanation.

name: Hanging Protocol Environment
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe and identify the best suited display environment for a Hanging Protocol.

name: Screen Specifications
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe and identify the best suited display environment for a Hanging Protocol.

name: Hanging Protocol Display
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe operations (filter, reformat, sort, presentation intent), layout and interactions for a Hanging Protocol. See Annex V “Hanging Protocols (Informative)” in PS3.17 for further explanation.

name: Hanging Protocol Selector Attribute Context
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that identify the context for a Data Element Tag that is used as a Selector Attribute (0072,0026) in Image Set Selector Sequence (0072,0022), Filter Operations Sequence (0072,0400), or Sorting Operations Sequence (0072,0600). The Attribute may be an Attribute nested within a Sequence or Functional Group Sequence, and/or a Private Attribute.

name: Hanging Protocol Selector Attribute Value
description: This macro specifies the Attributes that identify the value(s) for a Data Element Tag that is used as a Selector Attribute (0072,0026) in the Image Set Selector Sequence (0072,0022) or Filter Operations Sequence (0072,0400).

name: Encapsulated Document Series
description: This module defines the Encapsulated Document Series Attributes.

name: Encapsulated Document
description: This module defines the Encapsulated Document Attributes.

name: Real World Value Mapping Series
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Real World Value Mapping Series Module.

name: Real World Value Mapping
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Real World Value Mapping Module.

name: Product Characteristics
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to convey the characteristics or parameters of a contrast agent, drug, or device.

name: Substance Approval
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to approve the administration of a contrast agent, drug, or device to a patient.

name: Substance Administration
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to describe the act of administration of a contrast agent, drug, or device to a patient.

name: Substance Administration Log
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to record the act of administration of a contrast agent, drug, or device to a patient.

name: Surface Mesh
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Surface Mesh Module.

name: Points
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Points Macro.

name: Vectors
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Vectors Macro.

name: Surface Mesh Primitives
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Surface Mesh Primitives Macro.

name: Point Cloud
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the Point Cloud Module.

name: UV Mapping
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the UV Mapping Module.

name: Color Palette Definition
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe and identify a Color Palette.

name: Generic Implant Template Description
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Generic Implant Template Description Module.

name: Generic Implant Template 2D Drawings
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Generic Implant Template 2D Drawings Module. This Module contains all Attributes required for the inclusion of technical 2D drawings in an IOD, e.g., the Implant Template IOD. The Module specification contains the definition of a subset of the HPGL plotter language that is used for the graphical definition of the drawings.

name: Generic Implant Template 3D Models
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Generic Implant Template 3D Models Module. This Module contains Attributes that add context and scaling information to surfaces specified in the Surface Mesh Module, for 3D Models in an Implant Template Instance.

name: Generic Implant Template Mating Features
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Generic Implant Template Mating Features Module. This Module adds coordinate systems that can be utilized to geometrically constrain mating of Implant Templates when planning the implantation of a modular implant.

name: Generic Implant Template Planning Landmarks
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Generic Implant Template Planning Landmarks Module. This Module adds planning landmarks, i.e., geometric annotations that constrain implant template registration to anatomical features, to the Implant Template IOD.

name: Planning Landmark Point
description: This macro , Table C.29.1.5-3 and Table C.29.1.5-4 contain Macros for the definition of landmarks that can be used during planning to align an implant template with patient geometry.

name: Planning Landmark Line
description: This macro , This macro and Table C.29.1.5-4 contain Macros for the definition of landmarks that can be used during planning to align an implant template with patient geometry.

name: Planning Landmark Plane
description: This macro , This macro and This macro contain Macros for the definition of landmarks that can be used during planning to align an implant template with patient geometry.

name: Implant Assembly Template
description: This module defines the general Attributes of the Implant Assembly Template Module.

name: Implant Template Group
description: This module contains the Attributes of the Implant Template Group Module.

name: Unified Procedure Step Progress Information
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the progress of a Unified Procedure Step (UPS).

name: Unified Procedure Step Scheduled Procedure Information
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the Unified Procedure Step (UPS) to be performed. The UPS may or may not be scheduled for a specific time or device, or may simply represent a piece of work that is intended to be performed.

name: Unified Procedure Step Performed Procedure Information
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the performance and results of a Unified Procedure Step (UPS).

name: Unified Procedure Step Relationship
description: This module specifies the Attributes that describe the relationship of a Unified Procedure Step (UPS).

name: RT General Machine Verification
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to convey the parameters used in external verification of both conventional radiotherapy (photon or electron) and ion treatment deliveries.

name: RT Conventional Machine Verification
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to convey the parameters used in external verification of a conventional radiotherapy (photon or electron) treatment delivery.

name: RT Ion Machine Verification
description: This module specifies the Attributes used to convey the parameters used in external verification of a radiotherapy ion treatment delivery.

name: Display System
description: This Module describes the Display System.

name: Target Luminance Characteristics
description: This Module is a library of target luminance characteristics to be achieved in the calibration of specific configurations of specific Display Subsystems.

name: QA Results
description: This Module records the latest results of QA activities, such as calibration, performed on the Display Subsystems.

name: Display QA Result Context
description: This Macro records the context for a set of collected display QA results: when they were produced, the person/device that produced them.

name: Visual Evaluation Result
description: This Macro records the result of a Visual Evaluation QA task by a human for a Display System.

name: Luminance Uniformity Result
description: This Macro records the result of a Luminance Uniformity QA task for a Display Subsystem.

name: Luminance Result
description: This Macro records the result of a Luminance QA task for a Display Subsystem.

name: Content Assessment Results
description: This Module describes the results of the assessment of a SOP Instance.

name: CT Protocol Series
description: The CT Protocol IODs use the General Series Module described in This module , specialized by the CT Protocol Series Module, to describe the DICOM Series Entity described in Section A.1.2.3, and to define what constitutes a Series for the context of a Protocol.

name: Protocol Context
description: The context in which the described Protocol is defined or performed. This Module is applicable to defined and performed procedure protocols.

name: Patient Protocol Context
description: The patient specific context in which the described Protocol is performed. This Module is applicable to performed procedures.

name: Clinical Trial Context
description: This module contains Attributes that identify a clinical trial context independent of any specific Clinical Trial Subjects.

name: Patient Specification
description: This module contains patient characteristics for which a Protocol may be considered applicable.

name: Equipment Specification
description: This module contains equipment characteristics for which a Protocol may be considered appropriate.

name: Instructions
description: This module contains instructions relating to preparation and performance of the Protocol.

name: Patient Positioning
description: This module contains details about the positioning of the patient before and during the imaging procedure.

name: Defined CT Acquisition
description: This module contains a specification of acceptable values and ranges of acquisition parameters for an imaging procedure.

name: Performed CT Acquisition
description: This Module contains acquisition parameter values for a performed CT imaging procedure. The purpose of this Module is to record all relevant parameters, not just to record the values that were constrained in the executed Defined Protocol (if any).

name: Defined CT Reconstruction
description: This module contains specification of acceptable values and ranges of reconstruction parameters for an imaging procedure.

name: Performed CT Reconstruction
description: This Module contains reconstruction parameter values for a performed CT imaging procedure.

name: Defined Storage
description: This module contains specification of acceptable values and ranges of storage parameters for an imaging procedure. Storage protocol elements may be used to automatically send the output of particular protocol elements to particular destinations. For example, a lung protocol might send thick images to PACS for reading and thin images to a CAD workstation for detection of nodules; a cardiac protocol might send an image set to a clinical analysis workstation; and a protocol used for pre-operative hip replacement planning might send images to the orthopedics department.

name: Performed Storage
description: This Module contains storage parameter values for a performed imaging procedure.

name: Protocol Approval
description: The Protocol Approval Module records approvals of the content of one or more SOP Instances containing protocols by a person or device.

name: Manufacturing 3D Model
description: This module defines Attributes specific to models used in medical 3D manufacturing.

name: Radiation Fraction Pattern
description: The Radiation Fraction Pattern Macro specifies the intended fraction pattern to be used to deliver the radiation treatment.

name: RT Treatment Phase
description: The treatment phase Macro contains the identification and additional information about an RT Treatment Phase.

name: RT Treatment Phase Interval
description: The RT Treatment Phase Interval Macro contains the information about time-relationship between RT Treatment Phases. This consists of sets of pair-wise relationships, declaring the relation of a earlier phase to a later, potentially overlapping, phase.

name: Dosimetric Objective
description: The Dosimetric Objective Macro specifies an intended goal to be used in the definition of the dosimetric plan, for plan optimization etc. Dosimetric Objectives may define limits which affect the dose, such as dose volume constraints, minimum or maximum dose, treatment time or MU limits, and radiobiologic effects.

name: Radiobiological Dose Effect Description
description: The Radiobiological Dose Effect Description Macro describes whether dose values are provided as physical dose or effective dose. An effective dose value incorporates adjustments to dose by taking into account the radiobiological effects.

name: Treatment Device Identification
description: The Treatment Device Identification Macro identifies a device used to deliver radiation to the patient during a radiotherapy treatment session.

name: RT Patient Support Devices
description: The RT Patient Support Devices Macro identifies a patient support device (table, table top, chair or similar) which shall be used for treatment.

name: RT Accessory Device Identification
description: The RT Accessory Device Identification Macro identifies an RT accessory device and its location.

name: RT Treatment Position
description: The RT Treatment Position Macro establishes a connection between the patients geometry and the treatment delivery equipment to define the treatment position. When used in an RT Radiation object, this treatment position is the prescribed position. When used in an RT Radiation Record object, this treatment position is the record of the actual position.

name: RT Control Point General
description: This Macro specifies the base Attributes for the definition of an RT Radiation Control Point.

name: External Beam Control Point General
description: This Macro specifies the RT Control Point Attributes used to model external beam radiation.

name: Radiation Generation Mode
description: The Radiation Generation Mode Macro contains Attributes required to generate radiation by a delivery device.

name: RT Beam Limiting Devices Definition
description: This Macro describes the configuration of Beam Limiting Devices which cannot vary during delivery.

name: RT Beam Limiting Device Opening
description: This Macro defines the opening created by RT Beam Limiting Devices at a specific Control Point or set of Control Points.

name: Wedges Definition
description: This Macro defines the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery.

name: Wedge Positions
description: This Macro defines the positions of Wedges used in a specific Control Point or set of Control Points.

name: Compensators Definition
description: This Macro defines the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery.

name: Blocks Definition
description: This Macro defines the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery.

name: RT Accessory Holders Definition
description: This Macro defines the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery and which are used to hold accessories such as blocks or compensators.

name: General Accessories Definition
description: This Macro defines the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery.

name: Boluses Definition
description: This Macro defines the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery.

name: RT Tolerance Set
description: The RT Tolerance Set Macro contains information describing the maximum differences between planned and delivered values. This information is used in the context of delivery of the RT Radiation Set. If the absolute difference between a planned and delivered value exceeds the tolerance value, then it is expected that the delivery of the RT Radiation Set will be inhibited unless an authorized operator confirms that the tolerance may be exceeded.

name: Enhanced RT Series
description: The RT Second Generation IODs use the General Series Module described in This module , specialized by the Enhanced RT Series Module.

name: Radiotherapy Common Instance
description: This module specifies the Attributes that identify and describe general information in RT Second Generation IODs.

name: RT Physician Intent
description: The RT Physician Intent Module contains information about the overall intent of the treatment. The content is mostly descriptive text and allows for the presence of unstructured advice by the physician along the established nomenclature of the actual institution.

name: RT Enhanced Prescription
description: The RT Enhanced Prescription Module describes the delivery objectives and labels for intended treatment for a specific target, as defined by the physician.

name: RT Treatment Phase Intent
description: RT Treatment Phases define the intended phases of treatment and their temporal relationship.

name: RT Segment Annotation
description: The RT Segment Annotation Module references segments and provides radiotherapy-specific annotations for them. The geometry of each segment is defined by a referenced Segmentation, Surface Segmentation, RT Structure Set or any other general-purpose Instance that represents geometric information.

name: Segment Reference
description: The Segment Reference Module references geometrical representations, such as regions of interest, surfaces, lines, or points, which have been associated with a Conceptual Volume.

name: RT Radiation Set
description: The RT Radiation Set Module describes treatment fractions that contain a set of beams or brachytherapy setups used within a treatment session to help achieve the dosimetric requirements of a given Treatment Phase. The Module references a set of RT Radiation instances that describe the geometric and physical parameters that define the delivery of dose for a single fraction. In addition, the overall number of treatment fractions is defined, as well as possibly the fractionation scheme according to which, fractions will be delivered.

name: RT Dose Contribution
description: The RT Dose Contribution Module contains information about the contribution of dose of the RT Radiations referenced by this RT Radiation Set IOD. Dose contributions refer to the RT Radiations delivering the dose and to anatomical structures receiving the dose.

name: RT Delivery Device Common
description: The RT Delivery Device Common Module contains general information pertaining to the physical device used to deliver the treatment.

name: RT Radiation Common
description: The RT Radiation Common Module contains the Attributes shared by all RT Radiation IODs used for radiation treatment delivery.

name: C-Arm Photon-Electron Delivery Device
description: The C-Arm Photon-Electron Delivery Device Module contains C-Arm-specific parameters pertaining to the physical device. These parameters are used to specify or record photon and electron treatments, including geometrical parameters of the collimation system.

name: C-Arm Photon-Electron Beam
description: The C-Arm Photon-Electron Beam Module specifies how a C-Arm photon or electron treatment beam is to be delivered.

name: Tomotherapeutic Delivery Device
description: The Tomotherapeutic Delivery Device Module contains tomotherapy-specific information pertaining to the physical device. These parameters are used to specify or record the treatment, including geometrical parameters of the collimation system.

name: Tomotherapeutic Beam
description: The Tomotherapeutic Beam Module specifies or records how a tomotherapeutic treatment is to be or was delivered.

name: Robotic-Arm Delivery Device
description: The Robotic-Arm Delivery Device Module contains robot-specific information pertaining to the physical device. These parameters are used to specify or record the treatment, including geometric parameters of the collimation system.

name: Robotic-Arm Path
description: The Robotic-Arm Path Module specifies or records how a Robotic Path treatment is to be delivered. Multiple paths are encoded as separate RT Radiation instances referred to in the RT Radiation Set IOD.

name: File-Set Identification
description: Table F.3-2. File-Set Identification Module Attributes

name: Directory Information
description: This Module contains a Sequence of Directory Records forming one or more Directory Entities. This Module defines at least one Directory Entity, the Root Directory Entity (which may be empty). Each Directory Record is composed of Directory Elements (marked by a ">"). They include:
